Send us feedback at [marco@launchy.app](http://marco@launchy.app). “_For daily market updates and airdrop alphas, check out our __[telegram!](https://t.me/chaincatalystlaunchy)_“ — View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/0527dc80-ade1-46a8-8bce-b259d4df58aa/image.png) Caption: **HEADLINE** ## **GENIUS Act & The New Era for Stablecoins ** View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/8cc0b9af-5934-4eb6-8091-6655e300b851/image.png?t=1753596094) Caption: Total Stablecoins Market Cap / Source: DefiLlama **State of play:** On July 18, 2025, President Donald Trump [signed](https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2025/07/18/trump-signs-genius-act-into-law-elevating-first-major-crypto-effort-to-become-policy) the GENIUS Act (Guiding and Establishing National Innovation for US Stablecoins) into law, marking the first major piece of crypto legislation in US history. * The act establishes a federal regulatory framework for fiat-backed stablecoins, requiring full reserves, regular audits, and licensing for issuers. * It passed with overwhelming bipartisan support, 308–122 in the House and 68–30 in the Senate, and was celebrated by industry leaders. * The GENIUS Act provides long-awaited regulatory clarity, especially for stablecoin issuers. * Algorithmic and crypto-backed stablecoins remain outside the scope of this bill, with the former expected to be handled through separate legislation. The law has already catalysed a rapid market response. Within a week, stablecoin supply [surged by $4B](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-crypto-legislation-4b-surge-stablecoin-supply), pushing the total market cap **above $264B**. * Major financial institutions, including Bank of America and JPMorgan, have announced plans to launch stablecoin offerings under the new framework. * Industry analysts say the GENIUS Act could boost US dollar dominance globally by reinforcing trust in dollar-backed digital assets. * The bill also serves as a foundation for broader crypto regulation, with lawmakers now focusing on comprehensive market structure legislation. **What’s Next: **The Senate is expected to act by September 30. **Why it Matters:** The GENIUS Act brings long-awaited regulatory clarity to stablecoins, unlocking institutional participation and setting the stage for broader US crypto policy. **Our Take:** The real test will be how effectively regulators implement the law and whether future legislation can balance innovation with systemic safeguards. * For now, it’s a clear signal: US crypto policy is finally moving beyond headlines into structured action. View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/0527dc80-ade1-46a8-8bce-b259d4df58aa/image.png) Caption: **CASE STUDY** ## **Citadel Pushes Back on Tokenized Equities** _Credits to The Block and Sarah Wynn for the _[_original article_](https://www.theblock.co/post/363881/tokenized-equities-face-resistance-from-prominent-wall-street-firm-citadel-securities-in-letter-to-sec) **State of play:** Citadel Securities has formally urged the SEC to reject regulatory exemptions for tokenized equities, arguing they should be subject to the same rules as traditional stocks. * In a letter to the SEC Crypto Task Force, Citadel expressed concerns over liquidity fragmentation and investor confusion. * Citadel emphasises that tokenization shouldn't be used for regulatory arbitrage. * This comes as firms like Coinbase push to offer tokenized versions of traditional equities on blockchain platforms, potentially enabling 24/7 trading and disrupting legacy market structures. Citadel’s resistance highlights the tension between Wall Street incumbents and crypto-native challengers. While the SEC is exploring an “innovation exception,” Citadel is calling for a cautious, rule-based process with full public input. **Our Take:** The debate underscores a key regulatory question: should new technology inherit old rules, or be granted space to redefine them? The outcome could reshape how equities are traded in a blockchain-powered future. ——————————————————————————— _Take a peek at our referral reward at the bottom of this issue.
